statements: SELECT * FROM geolocation_data;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name FROM geolocation_data WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, latitude FROM geolocation_data WHERE longitude < -80;
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT location_name, latitude FROM geolocation_data WHERE longitude > 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM geolocation_data WHERE latitude < 0
SELECT location_name, longitude FROM geolocation_data ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%'
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT address FROM locations WHERE longitude > 0;

SELECT * FROM nearby_locations ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, address FROM locations WHERE latitude > 50;
SELECT address, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE longitude < 0 ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT location_id, nearby_location_id FROM nearby_locations WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude < 45 AND longitude >= -90 ORDER BY longitude DESC, latitude ASC;

SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT name, category FROM places WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70;

SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT users.username, places.name, places.category FROM users JOIN places ON users.location_id = places.place_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT locations.name AS location_name, COUNT(*) AS user_count FROM users JOIN locations ON users.location_id = locations.location_id GROUP BY locations.name;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT place_id, name, type FROM places WHERE type = 'Restaurant';
SELECT review_id, rating, review_text FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT name, type FROM places WHERE type = 'Restaurant' ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT r.review_id, p.name, u.username, r.rating, r.review_text FROM reviews r INNER JOIN places p ON r.place_id = p.place_id INNER JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.rating >= 4 ORDER BY r.rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE ST_Y(location) >= 40;
SELECT route_id, distance, duration FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT place_name, category FROM places WHERE category IN ('Restaurant', 'Cafe') ORDER BY place_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT place_name, address, category FROM places ORDER BY place_name DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE duration > '1 hour';
SELECT event_name, event_date, description FROM events WHERE ST_DWithin(location, 'POINT(0 0)', 1000);
